name: team_list
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool sportscore.
Tool description: Multiple sports API. **Site**: https://tipsscore.com  **Support**: hello@tipsscore.com / t.me/api_tipsters Detailed data on teams, standings, players, coach, starting lineups, team stadiums, odds and odds-history, match locations, video goals and highlights. Real-time data: live-score, table score (tennis), game incidents (substitutions, corners, cards). **Other sports api:** https://rapi.one
API description: Fetches and returns a list of sports teams from the SportScore API.

page.description: Page number for pagination. Defaults to 1.
